title: Honor Capsule loot gone
body: Hi, today I logged into League and got a honor capsule which is great, I opened it, got 2x Key frags, Twitch champ and Medieval Twitch Skin. BUT they are no where to be seen within my loot inventory, I didn't get any of that stuff, so I bought a random chest thinking I filled the inventory to the max, so then I unlocked it and got Sad Robot Amumu and it appears in my inventory. How do I get back the loot from the Honor Capsule I opened?

replies.body: NVM , turns out the champ and skin unlocked itself automatically and now exists within my collection. Gave me a good spook.
Huzzah! Yea the rewards from those Honor Capsules are meant to be immediate, no crafting required! Sorry for the spook tho ^_^

I had a similar thing, but i didn't even get to see what was in the box, when i opened it I got an error message telling me to restart the client and the box is gone now, and i don't have any new shards, or BE.
